content.chorus:
Sleep on beloved, Sleep on and take your rest,
Lay your head upon your Saviour's breast,
We love you but Jesus loves you best (name),
goodbye, go well
verses:
Sleep and take your rest (name), Goodbye.
Sleep on beloved, sleep forever dear
And back to the Lord unto whom you have come,
Goodbye, goodbye, goodbye!

Sleep on beloved, for Mary calls you Daughter
Depend on her, your mercy she shall plead.
Though brothers weep our comfort heaven be.
(name), goodbye, go well!

May the Angels, Saints, Heavenly throne.
Trumpet with glee and bid thee to the throne
Angel Michael and all the rest of them!
Will welcome you; goodbye!
